column5: Looking at Booking with Big Hook for 2007 and need info on any of the lakes. I have been to Cocos and would like to know how the others would compare.

We fished South Lake about 5 years ago if that helps any, 100 walleye a day was no problem, right in frount of camp. 200 yards from camp is a small rockpile you can catch lunch in about 20 min.Biggest Northern was 39in - 28 in walleye. We didn't find alot of weeds that held numbers of Northern. Overall a great trip.
